subjective.translation[0].definitions[0]: a statement, report, attitude etc that is subjective is influenced by personal opinion and can therefore be unfair
As a critic, he is far too subjective.
a highly subjective point of view
The ratings were based on the subjective judgement of one person.
subjective.translation[0].definitions[1]: existing only in your mind or imagination
subjective.translation[0].definitions[2]: relating to the subject in grammar
